channel.description: Recent content in statiq on Valticus

item.title: How To Deploy On Netlify
item.description: The official guide on how to deploy your website to Netlify, which can be found here, explains the required steps: Step 1: Add Your New Site. Creating a new site on Netlify is simple. Step 2: Link to Your GitHub (or supported version-control tool of choice) Step 3: Authorize Netlify. Step 4: Select Your Repo. Step 5: Configure Your Settings. Step 6: Build Your Site. Step 7: All Done. And it’s really as simple as that.

item.title: Why I Don't Use Netlify CMS (Yet)
item.description: The answer is simple - Netlify CMS doesn’t fully support Statiq Web yet. You can read more on the subject in this thread.
